title: Stripping off the rice panicle: induced genetic variation awakens the sheathed spikelet for a better yield
content: This article comments on:Ballichatla S, Gokulan CG, Barbadikar KM, Hake AA, Potupureddi G, Guha PK, Phule AS, Magar ND, Balija V, Awalellu K, Kokku P, Golla S, Sundaram RM, Padmakumari AP, Laha GS, Senguttuvel P, Lella Venkata SR, Patel HK, Sonti RV, Maganti SM. 2024. Impairment in a member of AP2/ERF and F-box family protein enhances complete panicle exsertion in rice. Journal of Experimental Botany 75, https://doi.org/10.1093/jxb/erae244.
siteTitle: Journal of Experimental Botany Current Issue
